page.title: 12ROSEDALE MIDDLE SCHOOL 2
page.content: We start work at 09.00 and finish at 16.00. We have two playtimes of 15 minutes, one in the morning and one after lunch. We have 1.5 hours for our lunch time. Some children go home but most stay at school.We have lunch from 12.00.We eat in our classrooms and all the food is cooked in our own kitchen. Some of the lessons we do are maths, science,reading,P.E.and music.In maths we do sums, use the computer and do practical work.We do topics that are a mixture of history, geography and science.We often visit places to do with our topics. In workshop we do a mixture of these subjects or art. We paint,draw,make clay models,sew and print.Each day we have assembly in the hall.We have stories, sing and share work together. We have many visitors from this and other countries to see the work that we do.
